lexUnit.name: smear.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: spread (a greasy or sticky substance) over a surface

sentence.text: He smeared the mud across his face , and then across his scalp so that it matted in his close-cut hair .
But soon he stood back and smeared the tears across the dirt on his cheeks .

Fix the glass internally by overlapping the concrete surrounds , with a liberal ribbon of silicone sealer ( aquarium quality ) and make waterproof by smearing the silicone around all the internal joints .
Do n't worry folks , I knew what to do -- smear some butter around the head and neck .
He smears ointment on a strip of lint and lays the dressing gently across my wound .
She smeared after-sun milk on her satin brown skin before joining Steve at the table with her drink .
Hargreave removed the sheet from the file and held it close to his face , smearing sauce on it .
You could always smear sticky treacle on the bit or make sure the bit is always warm before it goes into her mouth .
The Indians collect it in pots and smear it on the tips of their arrows and blow-pipe darts .
Visitors often smear the mud on their bodies .
Smear it on your four bedposts every night .
He told her to shut her eyes , and smeared the paste over her face , leaving breathing holes over her nostrils .
Smear flux lightly over the ends of the pipe and the inside of the fitting .
Smear this mixture all over the lamb , cover with cling film and leave the meat in a cool place to marinate overnight .
Another digs the cream from the centre of a pink fancy and smears it in his hair .
On site , this section is then set into a fresh layer of mortar which has been smeared across a hardened mortar layer .
Makassar Poison , which was smeared on dagger blades to make them instantly fatal , exerted a certain fascination over Europeans .
She smeared a little of the pink cream on the bottom of Lily 's lip .
Bright Eyes : you can keep shampoo out of babies ' eyes by smearing a line of Vaseline just above their eyebrows .
Besides the crash damage , the thieves had also smeared tomato sauce over the front seats and dashboard .
He stared at his sister whose pale face was made even paler by the sun-block ointment she had liberally smeared on her skin .
Simply smear on a generous amount over your skin after cleansing to make a revitalising face mask .
